backend/main.mo: Motoko actor providing HTTP outcall functions for external IP detection, ping latency measurement, geolocation info retrieval, and download speed testing using multiple fallback API endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two features related to investigating and testing map zoom flickering issues in MapView.tsx, both with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the app's geolocation tracking UI, map rendering with zoom stability improvements, coordinate displays, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the igo satellite tracking app design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with mobile-optimized meta tags, touch-friendly settings, and igo branding title for the location tracking app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing geolocation tracking state, trail recording, distance calculation, session management with mobile number input, and three-column expandable layout without forced map re-renders.
frontend/src/components/CoordinateDispla: Responsive card-based component displaying GPS position, accuracy quality badges, movement metrics (speed/heading), and total distance traveled in a single-column stacked layout.
frontend/src/components/DeviceInfoDialog: Empty file placeholder for device information dialog component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with dynamic year, heart icon, and UTM-tracked caffeine.ai attribution link using hostname as identifier.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with satellite icon, igo branding, and responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop viewports.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Interactive satellite map with Web Mercator projection, tile caching, zoom/pan controls, trail rendering, accuracy circles, and enhanced zoom stability through debounced rendering, ResizeObserver management, and concurrent render prevention to eliminate flickering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor with authentication, using React Query to cache the actor instance and invalidate dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and provider for ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook to fetch geo information from the backend actor with caching, error handling, and retry logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color theme using OKLCH color space, defining light/dark mode variables for a teal/cyan satellite-inspired palette and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/geo.ts: Utility functions for Web Mercator projection calculations including meters-per-pixel conversion, GPS accuracy visualization, and optimal tile zoom level determination for high-DPI displays.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH colors, container settings, font families, and animation keyframes for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a map zoom flickering issue as a known problem with two existing features focused on investigating/fixing the ResizeObserver-related flickering and testing zoom functionality.
